text.section: Any person who violates subsection (3) of KRS 247.270 or who diverts the funds or profits of a farm bureau to any purpose except the purposes of the farm bureau shall be guilty of theft and be punished as provided by law.

Any officer who makes a certificate required by subsection (2) of KRS 247.270 or by KRS 247.300, knowing it to be false or incorrect in any particular, shall be fined not more than one hundred dollars ($100).

law.history: Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 116, sec. 6, effective July 15, 2008. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 268, sec. 3, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 386, sec. 4, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 406, sec. 311. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 42d-8, 42d-14, 42d-15.
